title: The Non-Designer's Illustrator Book{BBS}
description:
Many designers and photographers own the entire suite of Adobe creative products, but they manage to learn only one or two of the applications really well. This new addition to the popular Non-DesignerÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s series from best-selling authors Robin Williams and John Tollett includes many individual exercises designed specifically to teach the tools and features in Illustrator that designers (as opposed to illustrators) need to use. Along the way, the book offers many design tips for non-designers. Individual exercises ensure that a reader can jump in at any point and learn a specific tool or technique.

In this non-designerÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s guide to Illustrator techniques, youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll learn:
